snippets.title: Card avec Chart Semi-Circulaire
snippets.description: Une carte avec un graphique semi-circulaire montrant la progression des t√¢ches
snippets.yaml:
- Card:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: AutoLayout
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.Semibold
      Fill: =RGBA(246, 246, 246, 0.5)
      Height: =317
      LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Stretch
      LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
      LayoutGap: =20
      LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
      PaddingBottom: =20
      PaddingLeft: =50
      PaddingRight: =50
      PaddingTop: =20
      RadiusBottomLeft: =10
      RadiusBottomRight: =10
      RadiusTopLeft: =10
      RadiusTopRight: =10
      Width: =479
      X: =384
      Y: =220
    Children:
      - legend_chart:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: AutoLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
            FillPortions: =0
            Height: =35
            LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Stretch
            LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
            LayoutGap: =20
            LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
            LayoutMinHeight: =32
            LayoutMinWidth: =32
            RadiusBottomLeft: =0
            RadiusBottomRight: =0
            RadiusTopLeft: =0
            RadiusTopRight: =0
            Width: =298
            X: =97
            Y: =211
          Children:
            - left_legend_frame:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =28
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =16.884349822998047
                  LayoutMinHeight: =32
                  LayoutMinWidth: =32
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =120
                Children:
                  - left_legend:
                      Control: Circle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(113, 50, 251, 1)
                        Height: =23
                        Width: =23
                        Y: =2
                  - left_title_value:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: ="Inter"
                        Height: =33
                        LayoutMinWidth: =50
                        Size: =18
                        Text: ="Done"
                        Width: =80
                        X: =40
            - right_legend_frame:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =28
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =16.884349822998047
                  LayoutMinHeight: =32
                  LayoutMinWidth: =32
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =150
                  X: =169
                Children:
                  - right_legend:
                      Control: Circle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(217, 217, 217, 1)
                        Height: =23
                        Width: =23
                        Y: =2
                  - right_title_value:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: ="Inter"
                        Height: =33
                        LayoutMinWidth: =50
                        Size: =18
                        Text: ="To Do"
                        Width: =80
                        X: =40
      - content_chart:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: ManualLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
            FillPortions: =0
            Height: =195
            LayoutMinHeight: =32
            LayoutMinWidth: =32
            RadiusBottomLeft: =0
            RadiusBottomRight: =0
            RadiusTopLeft: =0
            RadiusTopRight: =0
            Width: =393
            X: =49
            Y: =287
          Children:
            - img_chart:
                Control: Image@2.2.3
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                  Height: =195
                  Image: |
                    ="https://quickchart.io/chart?c=" & EncodeUrl("{
                      'type': 'doughnut',
                      'data': {
                        'datasets': [{
                          'label': 'foo',
                          'data': [50,50],
                          'backgroundColor': [
                            '#7132FB',
                            'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
                          ],
                          'textcolor':['#000555','#555555'],
                          'borderWidth': 0,
                        }] 
                      },
                      'options': {
                        'rotation': Math.PI,
                        'circumference': Math.PI,
                        'cutoutPercentage': 75,
                        'plugins': {
                          'datalabels': { 'display': false },
                          'doughnutlabel': {
                            'labels': [
                              {
                                'text': '\nTasks',
                                'color': '#aaa',
                                'font': {
                                  'size': '32'
                                },
                              },
                              {
                                'text': '\n20%',
                                'font': {
                                  'size': '44'
                                },
                              },
                            ]
                          }
                        }		
                      }
                    }
                    ")
                  Width: =379
